Title: Just Like at Home
Writer: Jason Katims (developed by), Ian Deitchman, Kristin Rusk Robinson
Actors: Peter Krause, Lauren Graham, Dax Shepard, Monica Potter
Plot: Julia (Erika Christensen) leans on her siblings for support during this trying time with Joel (Sam Jaeger). Jasmine (Joy Bryant) and Crosby (Dax Shepard) move in with Zeek (Craig T. Nelson)...
